data.name: AdventureTravel
data.value: Adventure Travel

data.name: AdventureTravel_Description
data.value: High-energy and thrill-seeking experiences (e.g., rock climbing, zip-lining, skydiving, paragliding)

data.name: ArtsFestivals
data.value: Arts & Festivals

data.name: ArtsFestivals_Description
data.value: Attending local arts and entertainment events (e.g., music festivals, art shows, theater performances, film festivals)

data.name: BeachWaterActivities
data.value: Beach & Water Activities

data.name: BeachWaterActivities_Description
data.value: Relaxing or adventuring near the water (e.g., beach days, snorkeling, scuba diving, surfing)

data.name: CitySightseeing
data.value: City Sightseeing

data.name: CitySightseeing_Description
data.value: Enjoying urban attractions and city-specific experiences (e.g., visiting landmarks, dining at local restaurants, shopping)

data.name: CruisesBoatTours
data.value: Cruises & Boat Tours

data.name: CruisesBoatTours_Description
data.value: Exploring coastal areas or islands by sea (e.g., river cruises, yacht charters, island-hopping, sunset cruises)

data.name: CulturalExploration
data.value: Cultural Exploration

data.name: CulturalExploration_Description
data.value: Immersive experiences in local cultures and histories (e.g., museum visits, historical tours, local festivals, heritage sites)

data.name: EcoTourism
data.value: Eco-Tourism

data.name: EcoTourism_Description
data.value: Sustainable travel with a focus on conservation (e.g., eco-lodges, guided nature tours, visiting wildlife sanctuaries)

data.name: FamilyFriendlyActivities
data.value: Family-Friendly Activities

data.name: FamilyFriendlyActivities_Description
data.value: Activities for all ages, often focused on family fun (e.g., theme parks, aquariums, zoos, family beach days)

data.name: FoodCulinaryTourism
data.value: Food & Culinary Tourism

data.name: FoodCulinaryTourism_Description
data.value: Discovering new cuisines and food experiences (e.g., food tours, local markets, cooking classes, wine and cheese tastings)

data.name: LearningEnrichment
data.value: Learning & Enrichment

data.name: LearningEnrichment_Description
data.value: Travel focused on personal growth and skills (e.g., language immersion, photography workshops, historical courses)

data.name: NatureWildlife
data.value: Nature & Wildlife

data.name: NatureWildlife_Description
data.value: Activities centered around nature and wildlife (e.g., safaris, hiking in national parks, birdwatching, camping)

data.name: RelaxationWellness
data.value: Relaxation & Wellness

data.name: RelaxationWellness_Description
data.value: Focusing on relaxation and rejuvenation (e.g., spa retreats, yoga retreats, meditation, thermal springs)

data.name: RoadTrips
data.value: Road Trips

data.name: RoadTrips_Description
data.value: Exploring multiple destinations by car, often with scenic routes (e.g., cross-country trips, coastal drives, countryside exploring)

data.name: VolunteeringVacations
data.value: Volunteering Vacations

data.name: VolunteeringVacations_Description
data.value: Traveling with a purpose to help communities or nature (e.g., habitat restoration, wildlife conservation, community support)

data.name: WinterSports
data.value: Winter Sports

data.name: WinterSports_Description
data.value: Enjoying seasonal sports and winter landscapes (e.g., skiing, snowboarding, ice skating, snowshoeing)
